name: LONELY HEARTS Vol. 1 ''The Raven''
description:
The Raven is in charge of the planet that we once called "Earth". Now it is a no man's land within the territory of the Galactic Union, due to the depletion of resources and degradation of the environment, a planetary exodus is generated, reducing the population to 15%. The new inhabitants live in a state of anarchy, the survival of the fittest. He serves on the most hostile sector on the planet. His search of redemption for his previous life has led him to become a masked vigilante who watches over the safety of the most unfortunate in the inclement order established within the area. Only accompanied by his droid "ZIGGY - 9913" on his missions. Meanwhile, he investigates a clue that may lead him to find another agent with an unknown location in the sector. 

Soundtrack By Gabriel Romero @OpacityLow
